title: Drawing, "Canal Scene Near Bruges, Belgium", 1875–80
medium: Point of brush, gray, blue-gray, and black washes, white gouache, graphite, possibly charcoal on blue-gray wove paper, laid down on illustration board.
signed: Signed with initials in red crayon, lower left: WSH
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: Bruges
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Roger H. Plowden (Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden
description: Horizontal view of canal cutting through flat farmland from right foreground, to left middleground, to right distance. Tall trees border edge of canal, their foliage screens two farmhouses. The moon is high in sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Canal Scene Near Bruges, Belgium", 1875–80.
1875–80. Point of brush, gray, blue-gray, and black washes, white gouache, graphite, possibly charcoal on blue-gray wove paper, laid down on illustration board.. Gift of Mrs. Helen Haseltine Plowden. 1958-20-1.
